characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance

characterDescription:
Wikim Davar, or Tet Wikim, is a son of Brightlord Lin Davar and Brightness Davar, younger brother to Helaran, Balat, twin brother to Jushu, and older brother to Shallan. He was frequently a target of his father's brutal temper and is prone to fits of despair.
While Wikim is feeling depressed at the Middlefest Fair, Shallan interests him in pages of math problems to predict the next highstorm.
